## Issue Type
Please specify the type of issue (e.g., documentation, question, maintenance task, etc.)

## Description
Provide a detailed description of the issue or request, following the foundational principle of Rita-Nora balance: structural precision combined with ethical flow as envisioned by our Comms Coordinator Nya Elyria.

## Context
Provide any additional context that might help understand the issue or request.

## Expected Outcome
What do you hope to achieve or see happen regarding this issue?

## Additional Information
Any other information that might be relevant to this issue.
